actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A resolution providing for the impeachment of Paul A. Volcker, Anthony M. Solomon, Lyle E. Gramley, J. Charles Partee, Emmett J. Rice, Nancy H. Teeters, John J. Balles, Robert P. Black, William F. Ford, Karen N. Horn, Preston Martin, and Henry C. Wallich, as members of the Federal Open Market Committee.

summary.text: Calls for the impeachment of Paul Volcker and the other members of the Federal Open Market Committee.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the impeachment of Paul A. Volcker, Anthony M. Solomon, Lyle E. Gramley, J. Charles Partee, Emmett J. Rice, Nancy H. Teeters, John J. Balles, Robert P. Black, William F. Ford, Karen N. Horn, Preston Martin, and Henry C. Wallich, as members of the Federal Open Market Committee.
